name: Twisted Bark Woods
description:
Download windows version for better lighting

Twisted Bark Woods is a platformer where you try to escape from the dark depths of a forest and all evils roaming in it. Find safety in the light.

Control:
A & D to move
Space to jump
L-Shift to push back spirits

Art: Catherine Verret
Programation: Leny Deslauriers
Level Design: Simon-David Blanchette

ALL visual assets were made from scratch for this jam

Liscence:
Menu music CC
Lights out – Myuu
https://soundcloud.com/myuu/lights-out
